So, what I'm attempting to do is make a parachute that I can use for a heavier payload than just the three man cockpit. (Specifically the 'crewtank-' I'm attempting to make a rescue module in case I need one.) However, every parachute I can find or tweak either tears off at the 'chute attachment point, or rips completely off the craft.

What factors do I need to edit to make a -really- strong (and I'd intended to make it heavy to compensate) parachute?

Also, apologies if this is in the wrong place.
